channel.title: [PI] Yellow "System Update In: (time)"
channel.description:
Hey! I was wondering if someone could help me get a yellow system update timer above the pm bar when I use the command ::update 600 (600 being seconds, but displays minutes above pm bar). Someone made a code for me in delta, but I can't seem to find one for PI!
My members have requested this, because they think it's really annoying when I update without giving plenty of time for warning, and I don't like using the yell channel every 10 seconds to tell new members that logged on.
Thanks bunches in advance!

Hey thanks man : D. glad to see some people still have kindness

item.title: [PI] Yellow "System Update In: (time)"
item.dc:creator: @NathanielBacon NathanielBacon
item.description:
@NathanielBacon wrote:

That commands already in there by defualt but if u removed for some reason here it is…

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“update”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a;
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

Read full topic
